## keyPath() function

builds key path

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function keyPath(keyType: KmsKeyType, keyID: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  keyType | [KmsKeyType](./js-sdk.kmskeytype.md) | key type |
|  keyID | string | key id |

**Returns:**

string

string path
